$description: Core sizing primitives. Raw dimension values for component heights, widths, and element sizes. Components and semantic tokens consume these primitives to define their specific sizing needs.

xs.$description: 12px size. Use for: small icons, compact indicators.

sm.$description: 16px size. Use for: standard icons, small elements.

md.$description: 20px size. Use for: default icons, inline elements.

lg.$description: 24px size. Use for: large icons, action elements.

xl.$description: 30px size. Use for: extra small component heights.

2xl.$description: 32px size. Use for: extra large icons, compact components.

3xl.$description: 36px size. Use for: small component heights.

4xl.$description: 42px size. Use for: default component heights.

5xl.$description: 48px size. Use for: large component heights.

6xl.$description: 60px size. Use for: extra large component heights.
